title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the spaghetti in salted water.
Beat the eggs and mix with Parmesan.
Drain the spaghetti and mix with bacon and egg mixture.
Season with salt and pepper, then serve.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Fry onions and tomatoes with spices.
Add cream and simmer for 10 minutes.
Mix the grilled chicken into the sauce and cook for another 5 minutes.
Serve with rice or naan bread.
